system.description: When you perform a ritual to secure a secluded place on campus for a meeting or deal, roll with SPIRIT.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, your attempt to warp reality to suit your needs results in something dangerous piercing the veil between worlds.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: On a hit, the campus bends to your will and produces a secure location only available to you and those you designate; it lasts until the meeting or deal is complete.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
On a hit, the campus bends to your will and produces a secure location only available to you and those you designate; it lasts until the meeting or deal is complete.

On a 10+, the place is quietly attuned to you; you never have to mark corruption when you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Nx2iP4uQ8vR1wS7t]{let it out} within.
